description: Here is a list of 5 major cyberattacks that happened recently which left many running for cyber cover:
title: 5 recent cyberattacks you might have missed

description: Tim Cook during his recent visit to the country had asked his India team to tap the more than five million iPhone users in the country to crosssell Mac computers.
title: Apple Macbooks to hit small towns in India

description: ​On the specifications front, the Lenovo Vibe K5 features a 5-inch HD display with 720x1280 pixel resolution. It runs Android 5.1 Lollipop operating system and offers dual-sim functionality
title: Lenovo Vibe K5 smartphone to launch in India next week

description: The announcement in this regard was made in a joint statement after the White House meeting between Prime Minister Narendra Modi and US President Barack Obama.
title: India, US to sign cyber framework in next two months

description: A portal called GeM, short for Government e-Marketplace, has been conceptualized by the government’s central purchase arm to allow sarkari babus to make routine office purchases from cups and saucers to laptops and printers online.
title: Government to launch e-commerce website for its employees

description: Popular instant messaging app WhatsApp will soon be getting GIF support.
title: WhatsApp to get GIF support soon: Report

description: After 13 years in Bengaluru, Umang Bedi will move to Gurugram to take over as the India managing director of the Mark Zuckerberg-founded social networking behemoth Facebook.
title: 'Facebook offers me a larger canvas to paint on'

description: Microsoft is back to funding startups in a big way, a practice it ended in early 2014. The company is reviving its venture arm, Microsoft Ventures, with an independent fund allocation to back startups ¬ akin to what Google Capital and chip maker Qualcomm's investment arm, Qualcomm Ventures, do. Ventures will be headed by Nagraj Kashyap, who previously headed Qualcomm Ventures.
title: Microsoft Ventures is back, with more funds

description: A Berlin city court is due to make a landmark ruling with ramifications for home rental firms such as Airbnb on Wednesday when it decides if homeowners can engage in short-term lets.
title: Airbnb awaits Berlin court ruling on home-sharing

description: The rules also mandated BIS authorised imprinting on device, box and the carton from July, which will have to be done on the assembly line.
title: New battery certification norms may delay smartphone launches

description: By the year 2021, India's smartphone subscription is expected to be 810 million, which is four times the subscriber base in 2015, said Ericsson Mobility report released on Tuesday.
title: India to have 810 million smartphone subscriptions by 2021: Report

description: Regulator IRDAI today proposed norms for selling and servicing of insurance policies through e-commerce platform with a view to increase insurance penetration in the country in a cost-effective manner. .
title: IRDAI proposes norms to sell insurance through e-commerce

description: British lawmakers passed on Tuesday a new surveillance law to give security agencies more extensive monitoring capabilities in the digital age after several amendments were added to better protect privacy.
title: New digital surveillance law passed by British lawmakers

description: Has the Sony Xperia X checked all the required boxes to become a worth buy? Read our review to find out.
title: Sony Xperia X review: Capable but highly overpriced

description: Here are 11 tech entrepreneurs that could be considered as largely responsible for these winds of change.

description: Those who own FIFA 16 on Xbox One, PS4 or PC can pre-order FIFA 17 Super Deluxe edition through the FIFA 16 main menu and get 10% off on the purchase.
title: EA announces FIFA 17, Pre-order details and launch date revealed

description: The LG Mosquito Away TV is equipped with an ultrasonic device which, once activated, uses sound wave technology to drive mosquitoes away.
title: LG’s new TV promises to keep mosquitoes away

description: According to Munro, the Mitsubishi Outlander hybrid uses Wi-Fi to connect with smartphones, a method that is less secure, thus allowing him to disable the car’s alarm and unlock it.
title: Experts hack Mitsubishi Outlander hybrid; over 100,000 units expect recall

description: Samsung might reveal the two smartphones, which are part of the company’s ‘Project Valley,’ as soon as February next year during the Mobile World Congress in Barcelona.
title: Samsung might launch smartphones with bendable displays in 2017
